subject: Soccer
Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
Sports Injuries
Brain
lead_paragraph: Researchers found C.T.E., a disease linked to football and boxing, in a soccer player who loved to head the ball, although they said the cause was inconclusive.
snippet: Researchers found C.T.E., a disease linked to football and boxing, in a soccer player who loved to head the ball, although they said the cause was inconclusive.
